name: A Trumpet Story
description:
this is a trumpet
this is a trumpet

and now I'm singing
and it's coming out a trumpet

and when I sing
it is a coming out a trumpet

when I was in school
I played the trumpet

and it was
embarrassing
because it was
my grandpa's

and it was broken
and it was old

yes it was old
and it was broken
and the kids made fun of me

not really

but I worried that they might

so I quit the band
so I quit the band
so I quit the band

and I never did
return
to the
trumpet

and I have
no idea
where it is
now

that's my story
about the trumpet

thank you! 

1:09, mp3, 2021
Maria Grace Chiappetta
